Notepub Documentation Template - LLM Full Context
Canonical site: https://<username>.github.io/<repo>/
Version: 0.1.1
Last-Updated: 2026-02-10

Scope
- This file is a compact navigation and retrieval map for LLM indexing.
- Replace <username> and <repo> with your repository values after creating from template.

Core pages
- Home: https://<username>.github.io/<repo>/
- Getting Started: https://<username>.github.io/<repo>/getting-started/
- Concepts hub: https://<username>.github.io/<repo>/concepts/
- Authoring hub: https://<username>.github.io/<repo>/authoring/
- Operations hub: https://<username>.github.io/<repo>/operations/
- Reference hub: https://<username>.github.io/<repo>/reference/

1. https://<username>.github.io/<repo>/getting-started/

Machine-readable endpoints
- Sitemap index: https://<username>.github.io/<repo>/sitemap-index.xml
- Robots: https://<username>.github.io/<repo>/robots.txt
- Search index: https://<username>.github.io/<repo>/search.json

Notes for indexing
- Keep slugs stable.
- Keep frontmatter complete (type, slug, title, description).
- Ensure canonical and base URL are correct in production.
